participant_1.background:
I remember the feeling of freedom when I ran through the woods behind my house as a child.
I stretch to get my blood flowing.
i am a recovering alcoholic.
i still call my ex boyfriend on his birthday because birthdays are special.
i am excellent at playing pool.

participant_2.background:
I've learned how to manage my time better and prioritize my tasks.
i love to dance.
My hair is a deep blood red, the same color as the blood of my enemies.
I try to stay in touch with my family as often as I can.
i clean houses for extra money.

content.text: What is your favorite way to relieve stress?
I love to dance! It always makes me feel better.
I love dancing too! I used to dance competitively when I was younger.
That's so cool! What kind of dancing did you do?
I did ballet, tap, and jazz.
I love jazz! I'm more of a hip hop dancer myself.
Hip hop is really fun too! I've always wanted to learn how to dance it.
It's not too hard to learn! There are a lot of great tutorials online.
I'll have to check them out! I love learning new things.
I'm sure you'd be great at it!
Thanks! I appreciate the vote of confidence.
No problem! I'm always happy to encourage people to dance.
Me too! It's such a great way to express yourself and have fun.
I agree! It's also a great way to stay in shape.
Definitely! I always feel better after I've danced.
Me too! It's a great way to relieve stress.
I'm glad we agree! I'm always looking for new ways to relieve stress.
Me too! I think dancing is one of the best ways to do it
